incident_updates.body: Start time : 29/07/2022 20:35 UTC Service impact : We are currently experiencing issues regarding network on APAC region Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the causse of this issue and the service up again.

Start time : 29/07/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency on services hosted on WAW infrastructure. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently fixing this problem. A replacement of the affected equipment is being considered.
Start time : 01/08/2022 06:10 UTC End time : 01/08/2022 09:50 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to add a circuit breaker on the normaclip of the electrical works.
Start time : 01/08/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 04/08/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to replace multiple fans of rack T01B

Start time : 02/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 02/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : There will be a power delivery source switch to battery for 1 minute of time. Service improvement: The main objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries.
Start time : 02/08/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 03/08/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 03/08/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 04/08/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we will carry out this maintenance for scaling in existing PCI spines.

Start time : 08/08/2022 02:00 UTC End time : 08/08/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : Interruption of the vrack networks during this operation. Service improvement : Replacement of a switch due to multiple untimely reboots.

Start time : 09/08/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 09/08/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : connections will be reset Service improvement : The purpose of this maintenance is to upgrade the load balancer service
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Start time : 30/06/2022 07:36 UTC End time : 05/08/2022 12:28 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 27/07/2022 13:24 UTC End time : 05/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 27/07/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 08/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive maintenance on the UPS of room G117B.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 25/07/2022 14:12 UTC End time : 01/08/2022 16:12 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 27/06/2022 10:30 UTC End time : 19/08/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Our technical teams need to do an operation on network's infrastructure. They will move near general infrastructure equipment but no impact is expected.
